      <table width="430" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
        <tr>
          <td height="8" valign="top"><img src="../images/inside_r2_c7.gif" width="430" height="8" alt=""></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td class="bg" valign="top"><!-- #BeginEditable "maintext" --> 
            <p align="center"><font size="1"><br>
              <b> <a href="contents.html">A-Z index</a> | <a href="index.html">Search</a></b></font></p>
            <h2 align="left">            Straight Talk - Uganda</h2>
            <p align="left"><img src="casepics/uganda_banner.gif" width="350" height="57"></p>
            <p><b>Contact details</b>             
            <p>Straight Talk Foundation<br>
              45 Bukoto Street, 
              Kamwokya, 
              P. O. Box 22366,<br>
              Kampala, Uganda<br>
              Tel: 256-41-543025 or 
              256-41- 543884<br>
              E-mail:              <a href="mailto:strtalk@straight-talk.or.ug">strtalk@straight-talk.or.ug</a><br>
            Website: <a href="http://www.straight-talk.or.ug/" target="_blank">http://www.straight-talk.or.ug/</a>            
            <p><a href="http://www.straight-talk.or.ug/%20" target="_blank"><img src="casepics/straight.gif" alt="Straight Talk website" width="350" height="75" border="0"></a><br>            
            <p><b>Location</b> 
            <p>Kampala, Uganda
            <p><b>Aims and objectives</b>

            <p align="justify"> To increase understanding of adolescence, sexuality,
              and reproductive health. To promote safer sex, life skills and
              child and adolescent rights.<br>
            <p><b>Background</b>             
            <p align="justify">Straight Talk newspaper was launched in 1993.
              By 1997 it had grown into a registered NGO, Straight Talk Foundation
            (STF), with multiple projects. Our mission statements are &quot;Keeping Adolescents Safe&quot; and &quot;Communication
              for Better Adolescent Health&quot;. Safe means free from infections
              and unwanted pregnancy and with the life skills, education and
            values to be a productive adult. <br>
            The radio show went on air in May 1999. The 30 minute weekly programme
            mainly targets out-of-school and in-school adolescents ( 13-21 )
            reinforcing Straight Talk messages of safer sex, abstinence, the
            use of condoms and life skills. The show is aired nationwide on 14
            FM stations, in English and 4 local languages. Plans to broadcast
            in more local languages are underway
            <p><b>Target audience</b> 
            <p align="justify">Children and adolescents in Uganda.
            <p><b>Involvement of children</b> 
            <p align="justify">Because of its popularity, Straight Talk Clubs
              have been formed in secondary schools and communities. These clubs
              are venues for open discussion about adolescent issues. Since 1994,
              over 230 Straight Talk Clubs have been independently formed. The
              Clubs are initiated by the adolescents themselves to discuss further
              the messages of safer sex with their peers.<p><b>Summary of project</b> 
            <p align="justify">Newspapers: STF's newspapers are adolescent-driven
              and age -appropriate. They are sent to almost 15,000 schools and
              are further distributed by 600 institutions and CBO's , NGO's and
              churches. They are also inserted into The New Vision.
            <p align="justify">Young Talk: For adolescents, aged 10-14, in primary school: Print
              run 300,000 per month: Key messages include: abstain know your
              rights, stay in school.</p>
            <p align="justify">Straight Talk: For secondary school adolescents
              and youth aged 15-24: print run 156,000 per month: key messages
              include: know
              your body, understand your emotions, wait or use condoms, Life
              skills and health care.</p>
            <p align="justify">Ener Eitena, Lok Atyer Kamaleng: Are local languages publication.              For
              out-of-school Ateso and Luo youth. Print run 100,000/issue: Key
              messages include: use condoms, seek STD treatment, and prevention
            of early pregnancy.</p>
            <p align="justify">The radio show went on air in May 1999. The 30
              minute weekly programme mainly targets out-of-school and in-school
              adolescents ( 13-21 ) reinforcing Straight Talk messages of safer
              sex, abstinence, the use of condoms and life skills. The show is
              aired nationwide on 14 FM stations, in English and 4 local languages.
              Plans to broadcast in more local languages are underway                <br>
            </p>
            <p align="justify"><b>Funders</b>            
            <p align="justify">Since
              1993, UNICEF has been a major funder of Straight Talk Foundation.
              Major funders now include Department for International Development
              (DFID), 
              The Ford Foundation, European Development Fund (EDF), 
              Danish International Development Assistance (Danida), 
              Swedish International Development Agency (Sida) and 
              African Youth Alliance (AYA)(Bill &amp; Melinda Gates Foundation.<p><b>Quotes</b> 
            <p align="justify">&quot;We wish to appreciate the aims of Young Talk,
              improved adolescent health and support for Universal Primary Education,
              literacy
                and persistence in schools.<br>
                <em>Professor Apollo Nsibambi / 
              Minister of Education and Sports, 1998</em>              
            <p align="justify">&quot;I'm a father of two and also a lecturer. I like Straight Talk
              because it tackles a problem we parents cannot handle very confidently
              at the moment.&quot;<br>
              <em>John Nayoga Mukasa, Senior Lecturer,              Uganda Poly
              Technic, Kyambogo.</em></p>
            <p align="justify">&quot;Your key messages have had a drastic impact on the academic performance
              and behavior of our students. They have acquired positive life
              skills related to health and in particular HIV/AIDS. Now, they
              are agents of behavior change in the community.&quot;<br>
              <em>Deputy Headmaster /Head of Science,              Buwabwala
              Primary School, Mbale</em></p>
            <p align="justify">&quot;Thanks a lot for the advice you have been giving worried
              listeners. I used it to bring one friend out of trouble and it
              worked!&quot;<br>
              <em>Aayu Diana, Kampala (Adolescent)</em></p>
            <p align="justify">&quot;Bravo radio team. Your message has had an impact on me.&quot;<br>
              <em>Asiimwe Nelson, Rukungiri (Adolescent)</em></p>
            <p align="justify">&quot;I thank Straight Talk for changing my behavior. I've learnt that
              there is no gain from unprotected sex. I also had an HIV test which
              was negative. I have decided to abstain from sex until marriage.&quot;
              <br>
              <em>McCollins (18), Nabitalo SS, Namulonge</em></p>
            <p>&nbsp;          </p>
            <!-- #EndEditable --> 
            <p align="center"><img src="../images/rule.gif" width="430" height="3" alt=""></p>
            <p align="center"><b><font size="1"><a href="../bits/partners.html" onFocus="if(this.blur)this.blur()">MAGIC 
              partners</a> | </font></b><font size="1"><b><a href="#top" onFocus="if(this.blur)this.blur()"></a></b></font><b><font size="1"><a href="../bits/privacy.html" onFocus="if(this.blur)this.blur()">Privacy 
              policy</a> | </font></b><font size="1"><b><a href="#top" onFocus="if(this.blur)this.blur()">Top</a> 
              </b></font><b><font size="1"><a href="#top" onFocus="if(this.blur)this.blur()"><img src="../images/arrow1.gif" width="11" height="11" border="0" alt="Top" align="absbottom"></a><br>
              <br>
              <br>
              </font></b></p>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>

<span
class="bable">19&nbsp;Bible Verses about </span><h1>Straight Paths</h1><div
class="no-w verse-cont block-verse"><h2>Most Relevant Verses</h2><div
class="content-box-wrapper-1 topic-cont-box"><div
class="ad_right" style="background-color: #ffffff">
 <script async src="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script> 
<ins
class="adsbygoogle"
style="display:inline-block;width:300px;height:250px"
data-ad-client="ca-pub-7806653645243842"
data-ad-slot="8209964738"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});</script> </div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Proverbs/3/6">Proverbs 3:6</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Proverbs 3:6 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Pay-Attention-To-God!">Pay Attention To God!</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Acknowledging-God">Acknowledging God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Cool">Cool</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Straight-Things">Straight Things</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Learning-The-Right-Way">Learning The Right Way</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Feet">Feet</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Kings">Making Kings</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Providence">Providence</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Answered-Promises">Answered Promises</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
In all your ways acknowledge Him, And He will make your paths straight.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
class="ad_right"></div><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Proverbs/3/5">Proverbs 3:5</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Proverbs 3:5 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Trust-In-God!">Trust In God!</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Trust,-Lack-Of">Trust, Lack Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Trusting-In-God">Trusting In God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Understanding">Understanding</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Worship-With-The-Heart">Worship With The Heart</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Cool">Cool</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/False-Confidence">False Confidence</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Trusting-Yourself">Trusting Yourself</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Earnestness">Earnestness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Spirituality,-Principles-Of">Spirituality, Principles Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Attitudes-Of-Trust">Attitudes Of Trust</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Trusting">Trusting</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
Trust in the LORD with all your heart And do not lean on your own understanding.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Proverbs/3/7">Proverbs 3:7</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Proverbs 3:7 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Fear-God!">Fear God!</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Hindrances">Hindrances</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/False-Wisdom">False Wisdom</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Conceit,-Description-Of">Conceit, Description Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wisdom,-Source-Of-Human">Wisdom, Source Of Human</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Pride,-Evil-Of">Pride, Evil Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Fear-Of-The-Lord">Fear Of The Lord</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Good-And-Evil">Good And Evil</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Reverence,-And-Obedience">Reverence, And Obedience</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Worldly-Wisdom">Worldly Wisdom</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sin,-Avoidance-Of">Sin, Avoidance Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Turning-From-Evil">Turning From Evil</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wisdom,-Human-Nature">Wisdom, Human Nature</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
Do not be wise in your own eyes; Fear the LORD and turn away from evil.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Proverbs/4/26">Proverbs 4:26-27</a>
</span><div></div><p>
Watch the path of your feet And all your ways will be established. Do not turn to the right nor to the left; Turn your foot from evil.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Proverbs/4/26">Proverbs 4:26</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Proverbs 4:26 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Feet">Feet</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Paths-Of-Believers">Paths Of Believers</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Learning-The-Right-Way">Learning The Right Way</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Feet-Secure">Feet Secure</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Care-Of-Feet">Care Of Feet</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
Watch the path of your feet And all your ways will be established.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Matthew/3/3">Matthew 3:3</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Matthew 3:3 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Named-Prophets-Of-The-Lord">Named Prophets Of The Lord</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Scriptures-Fulfilled">Scriptures Fulfilled</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Messiah">Messiah</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Individuals-Shouting">Individuals Shouting</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Deserts">Deserts</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Roads">Making Roads</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/John-The-Baptist">John The Baptist</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/In-Order-Of-Rank">In Order Of Rank</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wilderness">Wilderness</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
For this is the one referred to by Isaiah the prophet when he said, "THE VOICE OF ONE CRYING IN THE WILDERNESS, 'MAKE READY THE WAY OF THE LORD, MAKE HIS PATHS STRAIGHT!'"</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Mark/1/3">Mark 1:3</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Mark 1:3 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Highways">Highways</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wilderness">Wilderness</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Individuals-Shouting">Individuals Shouting</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Roads">Making Roads</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
THE VOICE OF ONE CRYING IN THE WILDERNESS, 'MAKE READY THE WAY OF THE LORD, MAKE HIS PATHS STRAIGHT.'"</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Luke/3/4">Luke 3:4</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Luke 3:4 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Written-In-The-Prophets">Written In The Prophets</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Books-Of-Prophecy">Books Of Prophecy</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wilderness">Wilderness</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Individuals-Shouting">Individuals Shouting</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Roads">Making Roads</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "THE VOICE OF ONE CRYING IN THE WILDERNESS, 'MAKE READY THE WAY OF THE LORD, MAKE HIS PATHS STRAIGHT.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Isaiah/40/3">Isaiah 40:3</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Isaiah 40:3 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Preparation">Preparation</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Highways">Highways</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Calling">Calling</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Messiah">Messiah</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Deserts">Deserts</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Deserts-Used-Figuratively">Deserts Used Figuratively</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Prophecy,-Fulfilment-Of-Ot">Prophecy, Fulfilment Of Ot</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Prophecies-Concerning-Christ">Prophecies Concerning Christ</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Herald">Herald</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Messianic-Prophecies">Messianic Prophecies</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Filling-Places">Filling Places</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Names-And-Titles-For-Christ">Names And Titles For Christ</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/John-The-Baptist">John The Baptist</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Roads">Roads</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Smoothness">Smoothness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Missionaries,-Call-Of">Missionaries, Call Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Witnesses,-To-Jesus-Christ">Witnesses, To Jesus Christ</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Roads">Making Roads</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Highway">Highway</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
A voice is calling, "Clear the way for the LORD in the wilderness; Make smooth in the desert a highway for our God.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/John/1/23">John 1:23</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="John 1:23 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Named-Prophets-Of-The-Lord">Named Prophets Of The Lord</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Written-In-The-Prophets">Written In The Prophets</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/John-The-Baptist">John The Baptist</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-Roads">Making Roads</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
He said, "I am A VOICE OF ONE CRYING IN THE WILDERNESS, 'MAKE STRAIGHT THE WAY OF THE LORD,' as Isaiah the prophet said."</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Hebrews/12/13">Hebrews 12:13</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Hebrews 12:13 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Paths-Of-Believers">Paths Of Believers</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Dislocating">Dislocating</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Learning-The-Right-Way">Learning The Right Way</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Feet-Secure">Feet Secure</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Cripples">Cripples</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
and make straight paths for your feet, so that the limb which is lame may not be put out of joint, but rather be healed.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Psalm/5/8">Psalm 5:8</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Psalm 5:8 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Christ-Our-Righteousness">Christ Our Righteousness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Walking-In-The-Ways-Of-God">Walking In The Ways Of God</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Guidance,-Receiving-God~s">Guidance, Receiving God's</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
O LORD, lead me in Your righteousness because of my foes; Make Your way straight before me.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Isaiah/45/13">Isaiah 45:13</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Isaiah 45:13 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Free-Of-Charge">Free Of Charge</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Building-Cities">Building Cities</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Victory,-As-An-Act-Of-God">Victory, As An Act Of God</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>

  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4127384/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495735765 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:04</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC4127384%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495735765%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A04">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2465551/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495737014 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:05</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2465551%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495737014%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A05">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>

            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2598712/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495764451 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:38</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2598712%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495764451%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A38">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

                            <div class="container">

        <div class="col1">
            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2598706/</div>

<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:39</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2598706%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495765002%20(ipmc12)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A39">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

        </div>
        <div class="col2">
            
        </div>

        <p>
          As you were browsing <strong>psycnet.apa.org</strong> something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen:
        </p>

          <li>You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed.</li>
          <li>You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser.</li>
          <li>A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or  NoScript, is preventing JavaScript from running.             <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4127384/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495773507 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:49</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC4127384%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495773507%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A49">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

        <h1>Pardon Our Interruption...</h1>
        <p>
          As you were browsing <strong>psycnet.apa.org</strong> something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen:
        </p>
        <ul>
          <li>You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed.</li>
          <li>You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser.</li>
          <li>A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or  NoScript, is preventing JavaScript from running. Additional information is available in this <a title='Third party browser plugins that block javascript' href='http://ds.tl/help-third-party-plugins' target='_blank'>support article</a>.</li>
        </ul>
        <p>
          To request an unblock, please fill out the form below and we will review it as soon as possible.

  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3523746/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495774388 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:29:50</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC3523746%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495774388%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A29%3A50">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2831392/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495800250 (ipmc21)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:30:22</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2831392%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495800250%20(ipmc21)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A30%3A22">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

                            <div class="container">
    <div id="maincontent" class="twelve_col col">
        <div class="col1">
            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1446478/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495801259 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:30:23</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC1446478%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495801259%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A30%3A23">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

}

            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4904174/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1495907395 (ipmc21)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:32:31</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC4904174%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201495907395%20(ipmc21)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A32%3A31">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

			<div class="post-inner">
				<h2 class="post-title">Not Found</h2>
				<div class="clear"></div>
				<div class="entry">
					<p>Apologies, but the page you requested could not be found. Perhaps searching will help.</p>

      </div>
      <div class='content col-lg-8 col-sm-7'>
        <h1>Pardon Our Interruption...</h1>
        <p>
          As you were browsing <strong>www.apa.org</strong> something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen:
        </p>
        <ul>
          <li>You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed.</li>
          <li>You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser.</li>
          <li>A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or  NoScript, is preventing JavaScript from running. Additional information is available in this <a title='Third party browser plugins that block javascript' href='http://ds.tl/help-third-party-plugins' target='_blank'>support article</a>.</li>
        </ul>
        <p>
          To request an unblock, please fill out the form below and we will review it as soon as possible.
        </p>

                      <div class="large-8 column maincontent column-max-width brandingStripe noGlobalSrch">

                          <h1>Access Check</h1>

                          <p>Our systems have detected unusual traffic activity from your network.
                             Please complete this Captcha to demonstrate that it's you making the requests and not a robot.
                             If you are having trouble seeing or completing this challenge,
                             <a href="https://support.jstor.org/hc/en-us/articles/115011068868-Troubleshooting-CAPTCHA-">this page</a>
                             may help.
                             If you continue to experience issues, you can
                             <a href="mailto:support@jstor.org">contact JSTOR Support</a>.</p>

                          <div id="CAPTCHA"></div>
                          <p>Block Reference: #1bbbe6b0-aecc-11e7-b490-91eaee9fdc61</p>

    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3128167/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1496087973 (ipmc21)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:36:09</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site.   <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2686987/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1496089090 (ipmc12)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:36:10</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2686987%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201496089090%20(ipmc12)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A36%3A10">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<span
class="bable">20&nbsp;Bible Verses about </span><h1>Parents Sin</h1><div
class="no-w verse-cont block-verse"><h2>Most Relevant Verses</h2><div
class="content-box-wrapper-1 topic-cont-box"><div
class="ad_right" style="background-color: #ffffff">
 <script async src="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script> 
<ins
class="adsbygoogle"
style="display:inline-block;width:300px;height:250px"
data-ad-client="ca-pub-7806653645243842"
data-ad-slot="8209964738"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});</script> </div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Ezekiel/18/20">Ezekiel 18:20</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Ezekiel 18:20 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Punishments">Punishments</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Punishment-of-the-The-Wicked">Punishment of the The Wicked</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sin-Clings-To-The-Sinner">Sin Clings To The Sinner</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/People-In-Righteousness">People In Righteousness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Being-Born-In-Sin">Being Born In Sin</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Credit">Credit</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Responsibility,-To-God">Responsibility, To God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/The-Dead">The Dead</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Personal-Responsibility">Personal Responsibility</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Fathers,-Sin-Of-The">Fathers, Sin Of The</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sins-Of-The-Fathers">Sins Of The Fathers</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Punishment">Punishment</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
"The person who sins will die The son will not bear the punishment for the father's iniquity, nor will the father bear the punishment for the son's iniquity; the righteousness of the righteous will be upon himself, and the wickedness of the wicked will be upon himself.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
class="ad_right"></div><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Exodus/20/5">Exodus 20:5</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Exodus 20:5 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Hating-God">Hating God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Worshipping-Material-Things">Worshipping Material Things</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Avoiding-Idolatry">Avoiding Idolatry</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Hatred">Hatred</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Forbidden-Worship">Forbidden Worship</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Bad-Parents">Bad Parents</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Reward,-Divine">Reward, Divine</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sins-Of-The-Fathers">Sins Of The Fathers</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Generations">Generations</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sin,-God~s-Judgment-On">Sin, God's Judgment On</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Bowing-To-False-Gods">Bowing To False Gods</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/God~s-attitude-towards-people">God's attitude towards people</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/God,-Jealous">God, Jealous</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/God,-Zeal-Of">God, Zeal Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Idolatry-Consists-Of">Idolatry Consists Of</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
"You shall not worship them or serve them; for I, the LORD your God, am a jealous God, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children, on the third and the fourth generations of those who hate Me,</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Exodus/34/7">Exodus 34:7</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Exodus 34:7 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/A-Forgiving-God">A Forgiving God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sins-Of-The-Fathers">Sins Of The Fathers</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Iniquity,-God~s-Attitude-Toward">Iniquity, God's Attitude Toward</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Punishment,-Nature-Of">Punishment, Nature Of</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Unforgiveness">Unforgiveness</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
who keeps lovingkindness for thousands, who forgives iniquity, transgression and sin; yet He will by no means leave the guilty unpunished, visiting the iniquity of fathers on the children and on the grandchildren to the third and fourth generations."</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Leviticus/26/39">Leviticus 26:39</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Leviticus 26:39 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/People-Rotting">People Rotting</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Survivors-Threatened">Survivors Threatened</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Fathers,-Sin-Of-The">Fathers, Sin Of The</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Offspring">Offspring</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
'So those of you who may be left will rot away because of their iniquity in the lands of your enemies; and also because of the iniquities of their forefathers they will rot away with them.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Numbers/14/18">Numbers 14:18</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Numbers 14:18 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/A-Forgiving-God">A Forgiving God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Speed-Of-God~s-Anger">Speed Of God's Anger</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Unforgiveness">Unforgiveness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Children,-responsibilities-to-parents">Children, responsibilities to parents</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Longsuffering-Of-God">Longsuffering Of God</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/God,-Patience-Of">God, Patience Of</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Sins-Of-The-Fathers">Sins Of The Fathers</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Fathers,-Sin-Of-The">Fathers, Sin Of The</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Reliability">Reliability</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Abundant-Mercy">Abundant Mercy</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Restraint">Restraint</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Generations">Generations</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
'The LORD is slow to anger and abundant in lovingkindness, forgiving iniquity and transgression; but He will by no means clear the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children to the third and the fourth generations.'</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Numbers/14/33">Numbers 14:33</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Numbers 14:33 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Those-Who-Kept-Stock">Those Who Kept Stock</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Monotony">Monotony</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Unfaithfulness,-To-God">Unfaithfulness, To God</a></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Dying-In-The-Wilderness">Dying In The Wilderness</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Death-As-Punishment">Death As Punishment</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
'Your sons shall be shepherds for forty years in the wilderness, and they will suffer for your unfaithfulness, until your corpses lie in the wilderness.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Job/21/19">Job 21:19</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">

title="Job 21:19 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a

class="tags" href="/topics/Fathers,-Sin-Of-The">Fathers, Sin Of The</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
"You say, 'God stores away a man's iniquity for his sons.' Let God repay him so that he may know it.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">

href="/Isaiah/14/21">Isaiah 14:21</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div

style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
"Prepare for his sons a place of slaughter Because of the iniquity of their fathers. They must not arise and take possession of the earth And fill the face of the world with cities."</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">

</span><div>

class="tags" href="/topics/Fathers,-Sin-Of-The">Fathers, Sin Of The</a></div><div
style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
who shows lovingkindness to thousands, but repays the iniquity of fathers into the bosom of their children after them, O great and mighty God The LORD of hosts is His name;</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">

The wicked are estranged from the womb; These who speak lies go astray from birth.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a

</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div

class="content-box-1"><div

"What do you mean by using this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, 'The fathers eat the sour grapes, But the children's teeth are set on edge'?</p></div></div><div

<span
class="bable">31&nbsp;Bible Verses about </span><h1>Parents Duty To Children</h1><div

class="content-box-wrapper-1 topic-cont-box"><div
class="ad_right" style="background-color: #ffffff">

<span

<a

</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Titus 2:4 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Wives">Wives</a><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Teaching-In-The-Church">Teaching In The Church</a><a

so that they may encourage the young women to love their husbands, to love their children,</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div

id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Matthew/19/13">Matthew 19:13-14</a>
</span><div></div><p>
Then some children were brought to Him so that He might lay His hands on them and pray; and the disciples rebuked them. But Jesus said, "Let the children alone, and do not hinder them from coming to Me; for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these."</p></div></div><div

"As for you, my son Solomon, know the God of your father, and serve Him with a whole heart and a willing mind; for the LORD searches all hearts, and understands every intent of the thoughts If you seek Him, He will let you find Him; but if you forsake Him, He will reject you forever.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div
id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Genesis/48/15">Genesis 48:15</a>
</span><div>
<span
class="verse"><div
class="concepts">
<a
title="Genesis 48:15 Verse Concepts" />Verse&nbsp;Concepts</a><div
class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Relationships-To-This-Day">Relationships To This Day</a><a

He blessed Joseph, and said, "The God before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac walked, The God who has been my shepherd all my life to this day,</p></div></div><div

<a
href="/Genesis/24/1">Genesis 24:1-4</a>
</span><div></div><p>
Now Abraham was old, advanced in age; and the LORD had blessed Abraham in every way. Abraham said to his servant, the oldest of his household, who had charge of all that he owned, "Please place your hand under my thigh, and I will make you swear by the LORD, the God of heaven and the God of earth, that you shall not take a wife for my son from the daughters of the Canaanites, among whom I live,											<a
href="javascript:void();" class="read-more-span"><i>read more.</i></a><br>
<span
class="read-more-span">but you will go to my country and to my relatives, and take a wife for my son Isaac."</span></p></div></div><div

id="Replacep">
<span
class="exdous">
<a
href="/Genesis/28/1">Genesis 28:1-2</a>

So Isaac called Jacob and blessed him and charged him, and said to him, "You shall not take a wife from the daughters of Canaan. "Arise, go to Paddan-aram, to the house of Bethuel your mother's father; and from there take to yourself a wife from the daughters of Laban your mother's brother.</p></div></div><div

class="popup" ><div
class="arrow"></div><div><a
class="tags" href="/topics/Making-People-Holy">Making People Holy</a><a

class="tags" href="/topics/Those-Who-Rose-Early">Those Who Rose Early</a><a

style="clear: both;"></div></div></div></span></div><p>
When the days of feasting had completed their cycle, Job would send and consecrate them, rising up early in the morning and offering burnt offerings according to the number of them all; for Job said, "Perhaps my sons have sinned and cursed God in their hearts." Thus Job did continually.</p></div></div><div
class="content-box-1"><div

class="exdous">

                      <div class="large-8 column maincontent column-max-width brandingStripe noGlobalSrch">

                          <h1>Access Check</h1>

                          <p>Our systems have detected unusual traffic activity from your network.
                             Please complete this Captcha to demonstrate that it's you making the requests and not a robot.
                             If you are having trouble seeing or completing this challenge,
                             <a href="https://support.jstor.org/hc/en-us/articles/115011068868-Troubleshooting-CAPTCHA-">this page</a>
                             may help.
                             If you continue to experience issues, you can
                             <a href="mailto:support@jstor.org">contact JSTOR Support</a>.</p>

                          <p>Block Reference: #4f99a440-aecc-11e7-a4c3-e9873358b384</p>

        <h1>Pardon Our Interruption...</h1>
        <p>
          As you were browsing <strong>www.apa.org</strong> something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen:
        </p>
        <ul>
          <li>You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed.</li>
          <li>You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser.</li>
          <li>A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or  NoScript, is preventing JavaScript from running.     <div id="maincontent" class="twelve_col col">
        <div class="col1">
            <div>
  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2686987/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1496130162 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:37:00</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. For additional information, or to request that your IP address be unblocked, <span class="el-contact-help">please send an <a href="mailto:pubmedcentral@nih.gov?subject=%5BPMC%20Exception%20Feedback%5D%3A%20Blocked%20request.%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.&amp;body=%3E%20%0A%3E%20Reason%3A%20Automated%20retrieval%20by%20user%20agent%20%22DataScope%20(v0.5.0)%3B%20python-requests%2F2.18.4%22.%0A%3E%20URL%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC2686987%2F%0A%3E%20Message%20ID%3A%201496130162%20(ipmc11)%0A%3E%20Time%3A%202017%2F10%2F11%2017%3A37%3A00">email to PMC</a>.</span> For requests to be unblocked, you <em>must</em> include all of the information in the box above in your message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>

      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>

  <div class="pmc-page-banner whole_rhythm">
    <h1 class="banner-color1 banner-text banner-title">Page not available</h1>
  </div>
  <div class="main-exception-content">
    <p>
      <em>Your access to PubMed Central has been blocked because you are using an automated process to retrieve content from PMC, in violation of the terms of the PMC Copyright Notice.</em>
    </p>
    <div class="pmc-warning-box el-exception-box shadow whole_rhythm">
<div class="el-exception-reason"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Reason: </span>Automated retrieval by user agent "DataScope (v0.5.0); python-requests/2.18.4".</div>
<div class="el-exception-url"><span style="font-weight: bold;">URL: </span>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4187531/</div>
<div class="el-exception-id"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Message ID: </span>1496137260 (ipmc11)</div>
<div class="el-exception-time"><span style="font-weight: bold;">Time: </span>2017/10/11 17:37:08</div></div>
    <p>Use of PMC is free, but must comply with the terms of the <a href="/pmc/about/copyright/">Copyright Notice</a> on the PMC site. WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 1332:1338 indexed as 217:None in following document:

The social, medical and legal approach to homosexuality ultimately led for its inclusion in the first and second publications of the American Psychiatric Associations Diagnostic and Statistical Manual (DSM). This served to conceptualize homosexuality as a mental disorder and further stigmatize homosexuality in society. However, the evolution in scientific study and empirical data from Kinsey, Evelyn Hooker and others confronted these beliefs, and by the 1970s psychiatrists and psychologists were radically altering their views on homosexuality. Tests such as the Rorschach, Thematic Apperception Test (TAT) and the Minnesota Multiphasic Personality Inventory (MMPI) indicated that homosexual men and women were not distinguishable from heterosexual men and women in functioning. These studies failed to support the previous assumptions that family dynamics, trauma and gender identity were factors in the development of sexual orientation. Due to lack of supporting data, as well as exponentially increasing pressure from the advocates of homosexuality, the Board of Directors for the American Psychiatric Association voted to remove homosexuality as a mental disorder from the DSM in 1973.[6] See DSM-III. After considerable delay and controversy, DSM-III-R (1987) dropped homosexuality as a listed mental disorder.[citation needed]

WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 1084:1090 indexed as 177:None in following document:

A definite physiological explanation or reason for homosexual activity in animal species has not been agreed upon by researchers in the field. Numerous scholars are of the opinion that varying levels (either higher or lower) of the sex hormones in the animal,[35] in addition to the size of the animal's gonads,[23] play a direct role in the sexual behavior and preference exhibited by that animal. Others firmly argue no evidence to support these claims exists when comparing animals of a specific species exhibiting homosexual behavior exclusively and those that do not. Ultimately, empirical support from comprehensive endocrinological studies exist for both interpretations.[35][36] Researchers found no evidence of differences in the measurements of the gonads, or the levels of the sex hormones of exclusively homosexual western gulls and ring-billed gulls.[37] However, when analyzing these differences in bisexual rams, males were found to have lower levels of testosterone and estradiol in their blood, as well as smaller gonads than their heterosexual counterpart.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 214:220 indexed as 38:None in following document:

Both male and female pigeons sometimes exhibit homosexual behavior. In addition to sexual behavior, same-sex pigeon pairs will build nests, and hens will lay (infertile) eggs and attempt to incubate them.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 226:232 indexed as 32:None in following document:

European polecats Mustela putorius were found to engage homosexually with non-sibling animals. Exclusive homosexuality with mounting and anal penetration in this solitary species serves no apparent adaptive function.[97][pageneeded]

Scientists point out, however, that even if such a gene were to be found, it is unlikely exclusively to determine someone's sexual orientation. This is still more likely to be the result of many different influences, biological or otherwise.

On May 13, 1971, in a conversation with John D. Ehrlichman and H. R. Haldeman, Nixon went on to discuss negative perception of homosexuality. He made the assertion that it led to the fall of Ancient Greece, referring to the promotion of same-sex relations in Ancient Greece. He also related homosexuality with areas of San Francisco known for a large gay male population, saying he would not shake hands with persons there.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 602:614 indexed as 114:None in following document:

By nature of this religious understanding of marriage, when churches use the term "Union" in a same-sex blessing ceremony, they may or may not be blessing this union in an equivalent way as they would bless a "marriage" as opposed to blessing the commitment between the two individuals. Some Christian bodies are exploring the manner in which same-sex couples could or should be blessed (or not) by the church.[201] Because same-sex religious unions are not widespread and because civil unions do not require religious officiation, documentation of the incidence of church blessing of same-sex couples is difficult.

In December 2012, the state of So Paulo likewise had same-sex marriage allowed in demand by court order.[152] Same-sex marriages also became equalized in relation to opposite-sex ones between January 2012 and April 2013 by court order in Alagoas, Cear, Esprito Santo, the Federal District, Mato Grosso do Sul, Paraba, Paran, Piau, Rondnia, Santa Catarina and Sergipe, and in Santa Rita do Sapuca, a municipality in Minas Gerais; in Rio de Janeiro, the State Court facilitated its realization by district judges in agreement with the equalization (instead of ordering notaries to accept same-sex marriages in demand as all others).[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 261:267 indexed as 45:None in following document:

New Zealand marriage law only applies to New Zealand proper and the Ross Dependency in Antarctica. Other New Zealand territories, including Cook Islands, Niue and Tokelau, have their own marriage law and do not perform nor recognise same-sex marriage.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 573:579 indexed as 96:None in following document:

Same-sex marriage became legal in Norway on 1 January 2009 when a gender-neutral marriage bill was enacted after being passed by the Norwegian Parliament in June 2008.[262][263] Norway became the first Scandinavian country and the sixth country in the world to legalize same-sex marriage. Gender-neutral marriage replaced Norway's previous system of registered partnerships for same-sex couples. Couples in registered partnerships are able to retain that status or convert their registered partnership to a marriage. No new registered partnerships may be created.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 231:237 indexed as 36:None in following document:

The Northern Ireland Executive has stated that it does not intend to introduce legislation allowing for same-sex marriage in Northern Ireland. Same-sex marriages from other jurisdictions are treated as civil partnerships.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 611:617 indexed as 116:None in following document:

Of the fourteen British Overseas Territories, same-sex marriage has been legal in Akrotiri and Dhekelia and the British Indian Ocean Territory (for UK military personnel) since 3 June 2014, the Pitcairn Islands since 14 May 2015, the British Antarctic Territory since 13 October 2016, Falkland Islands since 13 April 2017, Gibraltar since 15 December 2016, Ascension Island since 1 January 2017, Bermuda since 5 May 2017, and Tristan da Cunha since 4 August 2017. Of the three Crown dependencies, same-sex marriage has been legal in the Isle of Man since 22 July 2016 and in Guernsey since 2 May 2017.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 625:631 indexed as 114:None in following document:

Same-sex marriage is not legal in Japan. Article 24 of the Japanese Constitution states that "Marriage shall be based only on the mutual consent of both sexes and it shall be maintained through mutual cooperation with the equal rights of husband and wife as a basis."[381] Article 24 was created to establish the equality of both sexes in marriage, in opposition to the pre-war legal situation whereby the husband/father was legally defined as the head of household and marriage require permission from the male head of the family. The wording, however, inadvertently defined marriage as the union of man and woman.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 249:255 indexed as 44:None in following document:

In a ruling published on 9 January 2017, the 7th Constitutional Court of Lima ordered the RENIEC to recognize and register the marriage of a same-sex couple who had previously wed in Mexico City.[391][392] RENIEC later appealed the ruling.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 419:425 indexed as 78:None in following document:

Yu Mei-nu of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), who is the convener of the current legislative session, has expressed support for the amendment as have more than 20 other DPP lawmakers as well as two from the Taiwan Solidarity Union and one each from the Kuomintang and the People First Party.[416] Taiwan would become the first country in Asia to legalize same-sex marriage if the Civil Code is amended.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 466:472 indexed as 84:None in following document:

Female same-sex marriage is practiced among the Gikuyu, Nandi, Kamba, Kipsigis, and to a lesser extent neighboring peoples. Approximately 510% of women are in such marriages. However, this is not seen as homosexual, but is instead a way for families without sons to keep their inheritance within the family.[447] The laws criminalizing homosexuality are generally specific to men, though in 2010 the prime minister called for women to be arrested as well.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 1065:1071 indexed as 178:None in following document:

While few societies have recognized same-sex unions as marriages, the historical and anthropological record reveals a large range of attitudes towards same-sex unions ranging from praise, through full acceptance and integration, sympathetic toleration, indifference, prohibition and discrimination, to persecution and physical annihilation. Opponents of same-sex marriages have argued that same-sex marriage, while doing good for the couples that participate in them and the children they are raising,[450] undermines a right of children to be raised by their biological mother and father.[451] Some supporters of same-sex marriages take the view that the government should have no role in regulating personal relationships,[452] while others argue that same-sex marriages would provide social benefits to same-sex couples.[453] The debate regarding same-sex marriages includes debate based upon social viewpoints as well as debate based on majority rules, religious convictions, economic arguments, health-related concerns, and a variety of other issues.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 792:798 indexed as 147:None in following document:

All states that allow same-sex marriage also allow the joint adoption of children by people of the same sex, with the exceptions of Guerrero, Jalisco, Nayarit and Quintana Roo in Mexico. In addition, Andorra, Austria and Israel as well as several subnational jurisdictions which do not recognize same-sex marriage nonetheless permit joint adoption by unmarried same-sex couples: the Australian Capital Territory, New South Wales, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Victoria and Western Australia in Australia, Veracruz in Mexico as well as Northern Ireland and Jersey in the United Kingdom. Some additional states allow stepchild adoption by those who are in a same-sex relationship but are unmarried: Croatia, Estonia, Italy (on a case-by-case basis), Slovenia and Switzerland.[citation needed]
WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 294:300 indexed as 54:None in following document:

In Quebec, prior to the legalization of same-sex marriage, only unmarried people could apply for legal change of gender. With the advent of same-sex marriage, this restriction was dropped. A similar provision including sterilization also existed in Sweden, but was phased out in 2013.[citation needed]

WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 718:720 indexed as 142:None in following document:

Before I get much farther, here's a disclaimer: I'm going to consider how same-sex attraction might persist in human populations in the face of its apparent selective disadvantages. In the absence of direct data--such as systematic measures of the total evolutionary fitness of gay men or lesbians in specific societal contexts--it's easy to make up stories about natural selection, but much harder to determine which stories reflect reality. I'll try to delineate which stories fit with what we know about how selection works, and with the little data we do have--but that's the best I can do. If there's one point I hope you take from all that follows, it's that evolution is complicated, and human evolution doubly so.

WARNING in text: Could not create Span for match 1626:1628 indexed as 307:None in following document:

Intrusions are nearly always the opposite of the persons values. They represent a worry or fear of the very last thing the person wants to do or to happen. Thus religious people with OCD are distressed by intrusive blasphemous thoughts; moral people with OCD are upset by thoughts of acting immorally; peace-loving gentle people with a strong sense of what is right and wrong are upset by sexual or violent thoughts; someone with OCD who is in a perfectly happy relationship can have intrusive doubts about whether they are in the right relationship or if they are truly the one. Therefore heterosexual people with OCD who desperately want to be in a relationship or want children, tend to have intrusive thoughts about being gay or transgendered. This is all classic OCD. At one level the person knows that the thoughts are senseless  for example they are not physically attracted to the same sex, they have never masturbated while thinking of someone of the same sex, they have never had any sexual relationship with anyone of the same sex, and they have no desire for a same sex relationship. The individuals are not homophobic and have no ill feelings against the gay community. Despite this, they are deeply ashamed of such thoughts and images and often panic about experiencing intrusive thoughts and images of being gay. The occurrence of intrusive thoughts and images does not indicate latent homosexuality, any more than thoughts about pushing someone in front of a train when you are standing on the platform means you really want to murder them (but are just not admitting it) or that you are going to do so.

Context - My reflections are directed to fellow Christians, hence I use Scripture as the main point of departure, as we should all share belief in the normative and authoritative status of Gods Word. In other settings, for example addressing the secular world, Natural Law arguments would be more suitable. But, here today, the Scriptures and Church teaching form the foundation. Catholics, who should accept that the Scriptures are inspired by God and unerringly teach on faith and morals, must have a clear, biblical understanding of the teaching lest we share in the widespread confusion in the world.
